circle_app_use: Circle allows you to wipe your friend's phone. They must have Stellar Protect on their phone.
circle_app_description: All contacts you add here are stored on your phone, and not on any server.
no_contacts_added_message: Tap on the + button to add contact.
add_contact_description: To add a Contact, please add a Nickname for your contact and their Wipe Token which they can see on Stellar Protect app.
contact_storage_note: All contacts you add here are stored on your phone, and not on any server.
wipe_confirmation_message: All Data will be deleted from phone. Input Contact name to confirm it.
wipe_set_message: The phone must be online before it gets wiped also, we don't receive a status if the phone has been wiped or not.
delete_confirmation_message: Are you sure you want to remove {{ contactName }} from your contacts?
phone_wipe_status_message: The phone has been wiped or is set to be wiped
wipe_info_detail: This action will permanently erase all data on this device, including apps, photos, videos, contacts, and documents. Once wiped, this data cannot be recovered.
info_main_heading: Wipe and secure your friend’s phone
info_main_description: Circle allows you to wipe your friend's phone. They must have Stellar Protect on their phone.
info_add_contact_title: All contacts you add here are stored on your phone.
info_wipe_item_one_text: Add contact using protect Wipe Auth Token
info_brought_by_stellar: Brought to you completely free by
